Description: Count of distinct k-mers in sketched genome
Total number of k-mers in genome sketch
Count of distinct k-mers in sketched sample
Total number of k-mers in sample sketch
Boolean indicating whether genome is present in sample
The probability of observing this many or fewer k-mer matches under the null assumption that the reference organism is present in the sample (within the ANI and coverage thresholds)
Number of k-mers that are exclusive to genome
Number of k-mers exclusive to genome, multiplied by min_coverage parameter
Size of intersection between exclusive k-mers and sample
Acceptance threshold without adjusting for coverage
Actual confidence without adjusting for coverage
Mutation rate such that at this mutation rate, false positive rate = p_val. Does not account for min_coverage parameter.
Mutation rate such that at this mutation rate, false positive rate = p_val, accounting for min_coverage parameter.
